questiontext.text:
John Smith has 3 children: Antoinette, age 10.2, Lawrence, age 12.9, Sebastian, age 9.7.
The mean age of the children is $$\mu$$ = {1:NUMERICAL:=10.9:0.5} (±0.5).
The eldest child is : {1:MULTICHOICE: Antoinette ~= Lawrence ~ Sebastian}.
The child with the longest name is {1:SHORTANSWER:~=Antoinette}.

The child with the longest name is {1:SHORTANSWER:~=Antoinette}.
